title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not calculate real GDP per capita for Arturia for Year 2 as $8, does not calculate real GDP per capita for Ringberg for Year 2 as $8, and/or does not show the work.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Ringberg has the higher money supply in Year 2 and/or does not explain that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvaiaab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D14@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Ringberg has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Ringberg has the higher money supply.

The response does not state that Ringberg has the higher money supply in Year 2 and/or does not explain that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvaiaab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D14@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Ringberg has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Ringberg has the higher money supply.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not calculate the inflation rate in Arturia in Year 2 as 20%, does not calculate the inflation rate in Ringberg in Year 2 as 50%, and/or does not show the work.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Arturia experienced the higher real interest rate and/or does not explain that Arturia had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the long-run economic growth rate will decrease in Ringberg and/or does not explain that by allocating more resources to the production of consumer goods, capital formation will decrease, leading to less future production and consumption.

The response states that the long-run economic growth rate will decrease in Ringberg and explains that by allocating more resources to the production of consumer goods, capital formation will decrease, leading to less future production and consumption.
